channel.title: Film on Luke Jaeger
channel.description: Recent content in Film on Luke Jaeger

item.title: Ann Arbor Film Festival Sponsor Bumpers, 2003 & 2005
item.description:
Digitally distressed archival footage and original animation; created for America’s oldest independent film festival. Digitally composited and output direct to 16mm film.

2005 Bumper: Music by Birdsongs Of The Mesozoic.

2003 Bumper: Digital camera service by Pivot Media; music by DJ Flack.

item.title: 5 DREAMS
item.description: A rapid-fire collage of dream-inspired animation, this 16mm film highlights animation’s historical kinship with the dream world, a protean realm where anything can turn into anything. “A fireworks of visual imagination and surreal abstraction” — Victoria (BC) Independent Film & Video Festival. Mixed 2D and 3D techniques, including drawing, collage, xerography, stop-motion, and digital animation. Soundtrack by Birdsongs Of The Mesozoic.

item.title: Big Concrete Place
item.description: Orange-headed cartoon protagonist in a fruitless search for a screw removed from his head by a malevolent fly. Dark and surreal in the manner of Svankmajer and Road Runner cartoons, the film conjures a world in which characters’ fates are controlled by capricious objects (or animators). Full cel animation.
